abstract: Ismail Ould Cheikh Ahmed, United Nations envoy to Yemen, announces all sides have agreed to cease-fire ahead of peace talks scheduled in Kuwait.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: U.N. Envoy Unveils Truce Plan
headline.main: Yemen: U.N. Envoy Unveils Truce Plan

snippet: The country’s warring parties have agreed to begin a cease-fire on April 10 ahead of peace talks starting April 18 in Kuwait, the envoy said.
lead_paragraph: The country’s warring parties have agreed to begin a cease-fire on April 10 ahead of peace talks starting April 18 in Kuwait, the envoy said.
